name: DetachContactFromConversation
description:
Detach a contact from a conversation in Intercom.

Use this tool to remove a participant who is a contact from a specific conversation within Intercom. The tool should be called when you need to unlink contacts from conversations on Intercom, using their conversation and contact IDs.

parameters.name: conversation_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the conversation in Intercom. This is required to detach the contact from the specified conversation.

value_schema.description: The identifier for the conversation as given by Intercom.

parameters.name: contact_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the contact provided by Intercom. Use this to specify which contact to detach from the conversation.

value_schema.description: The identifier for the contact as given by Intercom.

parameters.name: intercom_version
parameters.description: Specify the version of the Intercom API to use. Options range from '1.0' to '2.9'.

parameters.name: admin_id
parameters.description: The ID of the admin performing the detachment action.

admin_id.description: The `id` of the admin who is performing the action.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Intercom API

parameters.name: conversation_id
parameters.description: The identifier for the conversation as given by Intercom.

value_schema.description: The identifier for the conversation as given by Intercom.

parameters.name: contact_id
parameters.description: The identifier for the contact as given by Intercom.

value_schema.description: The identifier for the contact as given by Intercom.

admin_id.description: The `id` of the admin who is performing the action.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
